channel.title: Version 7 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 7.2.0.beta (XXXX-XX-XX) Change Change Due t' refactor'n, th' expand shortcode an' th' notice shortcode wit' style=transparent now generate slightly different margins. New New Th' theme has updated its Merrrmaid dependency t' 11.4.1. This adds support fer Kanban diagrams. 7.1.0 (2024-10-25) Change Change Th' sidebar menus be now completely configur'ble.
